revised_title: The Role of a Scientific Staff College in Enhancing Scientists' Contributions to National Life
tldr: The author proposes the establishment of a Scientific Staff College to provide young scientists with a broader appreciation of the world and improve their ability to contribute to national defense and administration. The college would offer a unique opportunity for scientists to learn from each other, gain experience in various fields, and develop a deeper understanding of the applications of science in national life.
